content: the top of the pumpkin to the bottom to pull the centers in you can knot it on the bottom if that helps it hold the shape do not cut tail yet i also marked the top of the pumpkin but you don t have to ℹusing the tail we are going to create the grooves/indents in the pumpkin the tail should be coming out of the center of the bottom of the pumpkin sew the tail into the top of the center of the pumpkin through to the bottom and pull tight so that it squishes the pumpkin repeat this and space each line out to create sections of the pumpkin until desired look ℹonce it has the desired look tie off the end on the bottom of the pumpkin sew the tail into the pumpkin i used the tail for stuffing the stem by sewing the end through the top and left it to stuff page 3 of 4 stem ℹworked in the round 1 magic_ring or chain 2 and then crochet into 2nd chain from hook 6sc join chain 1 6sts 2 2sc in each st join chain 1 12sts 3 single_crochet in back loop around join chain 1 4 single_crochet in each st join chain 1 5 repeat round 4 untill desired size bobble and leave a long tail for sewing ℹstuff stem to likeness and sew to the top of the pumpkin ℹtie off tail and sew it into the body page 4 of 4
